Type.BattleDialog: We shall… commence… the… sweeping…
We march… ahead… without stopping…
There… appears to be… another side… to this luxurious place…
Now… all families… will be… able to… dine without… a worry…
I hope… other neighbors… stay… strong…
We must do… our mandatory work promptly… There are… still so many…
No matter… who falls on the side… We proceed…
I am… still okay…
Cannot… eat… them… They have become a book…
It has been a long time… since we swept… outside of the usual time…
We only… need to sweep… what is ahead of us…
Dear neighbors, have you refilled your fuel tanks?
With family, we can overcome difficult adversities.
For the sake of our children, we must acquire the objects called books from this place.
Let us retrieve the books fallen over there. Mother will rejoice.
Dear neighbors… Please… practice caution…
For the sake of our families in our village, we cannot stop.
We must clean everything before us first.
…A neighbor has died.
We will simply dine as usual.
They will not melt. They do not appear to be people.
Everyone. We only have little work left to do.
It is reassuring to be with our families and neighbors.
We will solve the matter on our own so that Mother does not grow greatly upset.
Let us quickly sweep and leave. We must prepare for the sweeping of tonight.
This book will be of great help to our neighbors sweeping in Nest L.
I hope everyone else can finish the work… safely…
Pay no attention to your surroundings when you sweep.
Remaining neighbors and families need not worry.
This is no time to assess the situation. The sweeping must go on.
They become books before we can melt them.
I am alright. I have not suffered much harm so far.
There is still much left to clean.
All is for Mother and our family…
I see less things to sweep than in the streets.
Our work is to sweep.
The power of family is not a bad thing… It is a good thing…
Are we to take that book?
Let us return. We need to prepare for the nighttime.
I am sorry… Dear neighbors…
I could not finish the sweeping…
I have family waiting for us…
We can still sweep them.
It is okay. We still have some more fuel.
We must move onward regardless.
They became books before we could melt them.
I am alright. I have not suffered too much harm so far.
There is still much left to sweep.
